name: ChonkinQuest
description:
Controls:

Move Left: A, Left Arrow

Move Right: D, Right Arrow

Jump: Spacebar

ChonkinQuest is a short, Avian-themed platformer made for the Pixel Game Jam 2022. It's a platformer about a humble round chicken out to defeat its more powerful avian-cousins. It has simple mechanics but it will test your skills in the platforming genre. Good luck!

Contributors:

Sukiyomi - Programmer

ArgentumCation - Musician

Gitrogatog - Programmer

Big Men (Nothing) - Pixel Artist

Ryan Le - Programmer

Mush - Pixel Artist

Deep Fried Steezo - Foley Artist

Text Font - LiberationSans SDF
